actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make level V of the executive schedule applicable to three additional positions within the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes level V of the Executive Schedule applicable to three additional Associate Administrator positions within the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make level V of the executive schedule applicable to three additional positions within the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, and for other purposes.
